Comments_List: Learned a lot about music, and Indonesian culture.
I learned more about my Indonesian heritage and its musical culture, which is something that I've always been interested in.
I thought that it was a strong course that had both textbook reading and instrument playing components, so that we learned about the context of gamelan but also go to experience the music itself.
Amazing course. A must take. Will enhance your Yale experience so much.

Yes, I would definitely take this class! The workload was not too hard: 1 hour of reading with a 200-word reading response every week, 1 take home midterm, and a 3-5 page final essay. With that being said, attendance is really important, and there's a group performance at the end, right around finals period.
